description: Comprehensive demonstration of panel-level data links feature across all supported formats

options.content:
# üîó Panel-Level Data Links - Full Demo Dashboard

**Interactive Demonstration**: Click on any visualization below to see data links in action!

## üìä What's Demonstrated

| Format | Panel | Action | Result |
|--------|-------|--------|---------|
| **Time Series** | Service Events ‚Üí | Click data point | View detailed events in table |
| **Logs** | Application Logs ‚Üí | Click log entry | Navigate to metrics or event table |
| **Traces** | OpenTelemetry Traces ‚Üí | Click span | Analyze query performance |
| **Table** | Service Statistics ‚Üí | Click cell | Drill into event timeline |
| **Flamegraph** | Query Stack ‚Üí | Click function | Find queries using this function |

**To view configuration**: Edit any panel ‚Üí Query tab ‚Üí Expand "Data Links" at bottom

panels.description: Click any data point to view detailed event records in table format

targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, service_name, count() FROM $table 
WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY t, service_name ORDER BY t

queryTemplates.name: View Event Details (Table)
queryTemplates.query: SELECT event_time, service_name, from_user, country FROM test_grafana WHERE service_name = '${service}' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 100

queryTemplates.name: View Logs for Service
queryTemplates.query: SELECT event_time, content, level FROM test_logs WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 100

panels.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Time Series: Service Event Count (Click ‚Üí View Details)

panels.description: Click any log entry to navigate to related metrics or events

targets.query:
SELECT 
    event_time as timestamp,
    content as message,
    level,
    label,
    toString(id) as log_id
FROM test_logs
WHERE $timeFilter
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 100

queryTemplates.name: View Service Metrics
queryTemplates.query: SELECT $timeSeries as t, service_name, count() FROM test_grafana WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t, service_name ORDER BY t

queryTemplates.name: Similar Logs (Same Level)
queryTemplates.query: SELECT event_time, content, label FROM test_logs WHERE level = '${log_level}' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 50

queryTemplates.name: All Events in Timeframe
queryTemplates.query: SELECT event_time, service_name, from_user, country FROM test_grafana WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 100

panels.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Logs: Application Logs (Click ‚Üí Navigate)

panels.description: ClickHouse OpenTelemetry traces. Click span to analyze performance. NOTE: May be empty if no traces collected yet.

targets.query:
SELECT
    trace_id AS traceID,
    span_id AS spanID,
    operation_name AS operationName,
    parent_span_id AS parentSpanID,
    'clickhouse' AS serviceName,
    intDiv(finish_time_us - start_time_us, 1000) AS duration,
    intDiv(start_time_us,1000) AS startTime,
    attribute AS tags,
    map('hostName',hostname) AS serviceTags
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
ORDER BY traceID, startTime

queryTemplates.name: Query Performance Timeline
queryTemplates.query: SELECT toStartOfMinute(event_time) as t, count() as queries, avg(query_duration_ms) as avg_ms FROM system.query_log WHERE $timeFilter AND type = 'QueryFinish' GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

queryTemplates.name: Most Active Tables
queryTemplates.query: SELECT database, table, count() as queries FROM system.query_log WHERE $timeFilter AND type = 'QueryFinish' AND database != 'system' GROUP BY database, table ORDER BY queries DESC LIMIT 10

panels.title: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Traces: OpenTelemetry Spans (Click ‚Üí Performance)

panels.description: Service statistics. Click any cell to drill down into detailed events.

targets.query:
SELECT 
    service_name,
    from_user,
    country,
    count() as total_events,
    min(event_time) as first_seen,
    max(event_time) as last_seen
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY service_name, from_user, country
ORDER BY total_events DESC
LIMIT 30

queryTemplates.name: Event Timeline (Detailed)
queryTemplates.query: SELECT event_time, service_name, from_user, country, too_big_value FROM test_grafana WHERE service_name = '${service}' AND from_user = '${user}' AND country = '${geo}' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 200

queryTemplates.name: Hourly Distribution
queryTemplates.query: SELECT toStartOfHour(event_time) as hour, count() as events FROM test_grafana WHERE service_name = '${service}' AND from_user = '${user}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour

queryTemplates.name: Compare Users
queryTemplates.query: SELECT from_user, count() as events FROM test_grafana WHERE service_name = '${service}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY from_user ORDER BY events DESC

panels.title: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Table: Service Statistics (Click ‚Üí Drill Down)

panels.description: Query execution flamegraph. Click function to find related queries. Requires trace collection enabled.

targets.query:
SELECT
  (arrayMap(
    x -> if(addressToSymbol(x) != '', demangle(addressToSymbol(x)), 'unknown'),
    arrayJoin(
      arrayPopFront(
      arrayMap(
        x -> arraySlice(reverse(trace), 1, x),
        range(length(trace) - 1)
      )
      )
    )
  ) AS trace_level)[-1] AS label,
  count() AS value,
  length(trace_level) AS level,
  countIf(length(trace)-2 = length(trace_level)) AS self
FROM $table
WHERE trace_type='Real' AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY trace_level
ORDER BY trace_level,level 
SETTINGS allow_introspection_functions=1

queryTemplates.name: Find Queries Using Function
queryTemplates.query: SELECT event_time, query_id, type, query_duration_ms FROM system.query_log WHERE $timeFilter AND query_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT query_id FROM system.trace_log WHERE $timeFilter AND arrayExists(x -> addressToSymbol(x) LIKE '%${func}%', trace)) ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 20

queryTemplates.name: Function Call Frequency
queryTemplates.query: SELECT toStartOfMinute(event_time) as t, count() as calls FROM system.trace_log WHERE $timeFilter AND arrayExists(x -> addressToSymbol(x) LIKE '%${func}%', trace) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

panels.title: 5Ô∏è‚É£ Flamegraph: Query Stack (Click ‚Üí Find Queries)

title: Panel-Level Data Links - Full Demo
